snippet: The Rays are lurking, just as they did last season when they took advantage of the Red Sox’ collapse and made the playoffs as a wild-card team.
lead_paragraph: The Rays are lurking, just as they did last season when they took advantage of the Red Sox’ collapse and made the playoffs as a wild-card team.

headline.seo: Surging Rays Find Themselves in a Familiar Position
